name: ESC.NODE
description: You wake up in a warehouse in a stranger world unsure of how exactly you got there. The world seems digital in nature. The last thing you remember is running a strange program you found on some old hardware called Nodend.EXE when something must have goes wrong. Trapped in this digital afterlife corrupted by your intrusion you must escape before this world collapses in on itself trapping you inside for eternity.
